author: David Hoffmann

review: I have two smart tv's but still purchased the fire stick so that I could dump comcast cable (blech!!!) and move to sling. Since neither of the tv's currently support Sling I needed to upgrade. Couldn't be happier.  When streaming to my tv downstairs (wi-fi) I would get a very choppy connection. Zero problems and much faster with the fire stick. Use if for plex as well and stream in HD with no lag (currently only have a 25 mbps connection at home). It helps that I'm already in the amazon eco system but I got one fire stick for free (pre-paid for 3 months of sling) and I got the other one for 10 off (29.95) as another sling promotion. Would highly recommend to any one who's thinking of cutting the cord or simply to boost your streaming exp.
